question: Who has received the prestigious Prof N R Madhava Menon Best Law Teacher Award?
explanation: Tahir Mahmood has received the prestigious Prof N R Madhava Menon Best Law Teacher Award as part of the Law Teachers' Day celebrations. Prof V C Vivekanandan has received the SILF-MILAT Legal Education Innovation Award. Justice A B Rohatgi Jurist Award was given to former Secretary General of the 15th Lok Sabha, T K Viswanathan.
